#summary How to compile the TibiaAPI from the latest repository source code
#labels Featured

 # Checkout the latest version of the code (see [SVNSetup])
 # Open the project file trunk/PokemonApi.csproj in Visual Studio 2008.
 # Build the project by clicking Build > Build Solution
 # You need to build in Release mode first, so the injected dll can be added as a resource for PokemonApi
 # The DLL can be found at trunk/Pokemon_Inject.dll
